# Flash Photography

## Red-Eye Removal
Red-eye removal is available when an option other than **OFF** is selected for **FLASH SETTING > RED EYE REMOVAL** and **AF/MF SETTING > FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING** is **FACE DETECTION ON**. Red-eye removal minimizes "red-eye" caused when light from the flash is reflected from the subjectâ€™s retinas.

## Flash Sync Speed
The flash will synchronize with the shutter at shutter speeds of 1/2000 s or slower.

## Optional Flash Units from Fujifilm
The camera can be used with optional Fujifilm shoe-mounted flash units.

## Third-Party Flash Units
Do not use third-party flash units that apply over 300 V to the camera hot shoe.
